name: Garden Chair Eats Space Ants
description:
Garden Chair the anteater is a superior being who can traverse the vacuum of space with merely a jetpack and a dream. The aim is to eat as many ants as possible while avoiding being hit by the red ants, be careful as they can transform at any moment.

Backing song is the instrumental to Jaws by Lemon Demon

Garden Chair squeaks, that is the sound they make not a terrifying Jurassic Park-esque noise like the rest.

Lost a bet to my cousin, this is the outcome.

I have become overly attached to Garden Chair who is a menace to society, don't let their no thoughts head empty look fool you, there are many thoughts and most of them are about chaos and murder, the rest is just ants.

Controls:

Walk - W A S D / Left Stick

Lick/Eat Ants - Left Click / Right Trigger

Boost - Right Click / Left Trigger

Hold down the boost to go faster but have it deplete quicker, press it once to go fast for longer.
